title: Giovanni - looking for good sans serif body font
content: Looking for suggestions for a sans serif body text font that would go with Giovanni Book Light headers (which cannot be changed). Any ideas? Thanks!
author: Alplily

comments.content: As far as I'm aware there is no such thing as 'Giovanni Book Light' ? but, be that as it may, I would look towards Calluna or Eureka Sans if for no other reason than the venetian angled crossbar on the 'e'

Thanks, that's what the designer said he used (Giovanni Book Light), so he may be wrong on the finer details. I am an in-house designer set with the task of developing the rest of the ID templates. I will check out Calluna and Eureka. I like the idea of matching the "e", and will also try to find sans fonts that use the older style "g" and "a" as used by Giovanni.
